thread.title: TRAVEL: Long delays between Newcastle and Darlington | Tyne Tees
thread.title_full: TRAVEL: Long delays between Newcastle and Darlington | Tyne Tees - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: TRAVEL: Long delays between Newcastle and Darlington | Tyne Tees
text:
There are currently delays of up to one hour on CrossCountry, First Transpennine Express, Northern Rail and Virgin Trains East Coast between Newcastle and Darlington due to emergency services dealing with an incident at Durham.
National Rail @NRE_vteastcoast Follow NEW: Disruption between Newcastle and Darlington expected until 09:00 #Durham http://t.co/4ScLNRHM5U
05:00 - 3 Sep 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite Routes affected:
CrossCountry between Newcastle and Plymouth / Southampton Central First TransPennine Express between Newcastle and Liverpool Lime Street Northern Rail between Newcastle and Saltburn Virgin Trains East Coast between Edinburgh and London Kings Cross To check your journey, please use the National Rail Enquiries real-time Journey Planner .
Last updated Thu 3 Sep 2015 Read more 4 updates Man dies after being hit by a train in County Durham Travel Newcastle Darlington Sunderland York North Yorkshire County Durham Gateshead Durham Northumberland Teesside Tyne and Wear Middlesbrough
